institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 13-2 (Change in Business Plan)
contents: Article 13-2 (Change in Business Plan) Notwithstanding Article 13, if the employment situation deteriorates rapidly or is likely to worsen pursuant to Article 32 of the Framework Act on Employment Policy and Article 29 of the Enforcement Decree of the same Act, Article 13, Paragraph 1 of the Regulations You may request reconsideration of the business plan by changing the matters related to paragraphs 2 and 3.
